job_description:
Company: CloudScale
Position: Cloud Architect
Location: Remote
Salary: $150,000 - $200,000

About Us:
CloudScale helps businesses migrate to and manage their cloud infrastructure. We are experts in cloud computing and dedicated to providing our clients with the best possible service.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Cloud Architect to help design and implement cloud solutions for our clients. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with cloud computing platforms and infrastructure-as-code.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement cloud solutions for our clients.
- Develop and maintain infrastructure-as-code templates.
- Provide technical guidance and support to development teams.
- Stay up-to-date on the latest cloud technologies.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in cloud architecture.
- Extensive experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP.
- Proficiency with Terraform or CloudFormation.
- Strong understanding of cloud security best practices.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Cloud certifications (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Solutions Architect Expert).
- Experience with Kubernetes.
- Knowledge of DevOps principles.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits.
- Remote work options.
- Opportunity to work on challenging and innovative projects.
